QueryResult.text: SELECT L.ID, L.LOOKUP_TYPE, L.IS_SYSTEM, L.IS_ACTIVE, L.IS_ADMIN_VISIBLE, L.IS_SORTED_ALPHA, L.CREATED_DATE, L.CREATED_BY, L.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, L.LAST_UPDATED_BY, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, NLS.NAME, NLS.DESCRIPTION, L.SOURCE FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_LOOKUP_TYPES L WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_LOOKUP_TYPES' AND NLS.PK_ID = L.ID
